message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's truly exceptional and I believe it will greatly benefit you. Considering its value and quality, I propose a price of $9,500 for it.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice, but I'm looking to save some money. Considering the product's value and quality, I'm willing to pay $8,800 for it. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value and my budget.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and I'm willing to negotiate. Considering the product's value and your offer, I would like to propose a price of $9,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your budget while still reflecting the product's true worth.
